name: Feed the Horde
description:
A game developped in two days for the Kenney Jam 2022.

Starting as one confused zombie lost in the city jungle, make your way to the top of the food chain. Chase people, grow your horde, destroy everything in your path !

Controls :

  • Use the left stick or the arrow keys to move the horde.
  • Press A or space to sprint. This ability is limited so use it wisely !

Some hints :

  •  It's a dangerous world out there. But if your horde become big enough, you will be the danger.
  • The northest districts are more populated but also more geared, be ready.
  • We heard that some evil corporation has its headquarters in the business district of the city. Drop by to say hello if you pass by !

Bonus : If you want to unleash your true potential, press "P" on your keyboard to add zombies to your horde ;)
